meanings.definition: The act of transferring data from a remote computer to a local computer.
meanings.sent1: She completed the downloads of her favorite songs onto her laptop.
meanings.sent2: The downloads of the new software took longer than expected.
meanings.sent3: The downloads of cat videos made her laugh uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a library where downloads of knowledge never ceased.
meanings.sent5: The downloads of information flooded her brain with new ideas.

meanings.definition: A file or program that has been transferred from a remote computer to a local computer.
meanings.sent1: He organized the downloads of photos into different folders.
meanings.sent2: The downloads of games filled up the computer's memory quickly.
meanings.sent3: The downloads of recipes inspired her to try new dishes.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was a hard drive full of downloads of memories.
meanings.sent5: The downloads of movies brought joy to their movie nights.
